creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: very long, narrow image; short, balding man wearing white robe with light blue crisscross pattern; man is balancing on one foot with both arms in the air; he is looking upwards at a deep plate that is balancing on top of an extremely long pole; pole is resting on his forehead
dimension:
35 13/16 × 4 1/8 in. (90.96 × 10.48 cm) (image)
5 1/2 in. (13.97 cm) (mount, without roller)
markings: square relief stamp LRC  the red seal; 精斎in the right bottom of the image.
title: Balancing a Plate
